Conjuration 8

Guardians of the Deep
Ritual
W6
spell id [id]: 833
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 52
spec [spec]: 41943040
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 60W
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Guardians of the Deep
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok], Use Underwater Only [uwonly])
Sea monsters will help the local militia defend underwater provinces for as long as this spell is in effect. The defending monsters are dependent on the terrain and type of sea. The monsters require some small degree of leadership and guidance, so a small local defence is required for the enchantment to have any effect, but sometimes a group of monsters can emerge and attack enemy provinces under your dominion. The global enchantment will last until it is dispelled or the caster dies.
